alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:59PM MST until March 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...The Southern Mountains as well as Zion National Park above 4500 feet. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all higher elevation routes into the evening hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will linger through the remainder of the afternoon before tapering off this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
